resources.string: WITH RECURSIVE [categories]([id], [name], [parent_id], [is_visible]) AS ( SELECT [category].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id], [category].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [category] UNION ALL SELECT [categories].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] || \'>\' || [categories].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id], [categories].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [categories] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[id] = [categories].[parent_id] ) SELECT [categories].[id] AS [id], [categories].[name] AS [text], [categories].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [categories] WHERE [categories].[parent_id] IS NULL;

WITH RECURSIVE [category_ids_filter]([category_id]) AS ( SELECT ?1 AS [category_id] UNION ALL SELECT [category].[id] AS [category_id] FROM [category_ids_filter] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[parent_id] = [category_ids_filter].[category_id] ) SELECT [currency].[id] AS [id], [currency].[name] AS [text], [currency].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [currency] WHERE [currency].[id] IN ( SELECT [account].[currency_id] FROM [transaction] INNER JOIN [account] ON [account].[id] = [transaction].[account_id] WHERE [transaction].[is_committed] = 1 AND [transaction].[category_id] IN [category_ids_filter] AND [transaction].[created_at_utc] > ?2 AND [transaction].[created_at_utc] < ?3 );
